channel.title: QuestHandler.java
channel.description:
I'm trying to create a basic quest handler with requirements and everything, I wan't to know how to do the requirements part as I am extremely lost >_<.
What I have is a string of ints as public int Attack = -1; and so on but I have no idea on another way to do this.
